sentences.en: Athena : As usual, I feel compelled to restate the problem.
sentences.cn: 照例, 我觉得有必要重申一下问题.

sentences.en: He continued throughout to restate his opposition to violence.
sentences.cn: 他一直不断重申他反对暴力。

sentences.en: He is not changing the rules; he is simply restating the policy that was established last year.
sentences.cn: 他没有改变规定，只是把去年定下来的政策重新表述了一下。

sentences.en: I would like to restate my high interest in the secretary position.
sentences.cn: 我想再次重申我对秘书这一职位非常感兴趣.

sentences.en: Let me restate that vision briefly.
sentences.cn: 让我简单重申我的理想.

sentences.en: Let us restate this problem as one of putting n identical balls in r different boxes.
sentences.cn: 让我们把此问题重新叙述为把n个相同的球放进r个不同的盒子的问题.

sentences.en: Restate combination cards and membership cards modes is not a novelty.
sentences.cn: 从广义上讲组合制卡和会员卡制作方式并非新生事物.

sentences.en: Send any message to Post Restate, Athens '.
sentences.cn: 把任何信件都寄到“雅典存局候领处. ”

sentences.en: Some people restate the job's requirements in their summary of qualifications or objective.
sentences.cn: 很多人在简历中或目标总结中复述工作要求.

sentences.en: The results sometimes restate the obvious, but just as often they are new and provocative.
sentences.cn: 研究结果有时只是在重申那些显而易见的观点, 但同样很多时候其结论是新颖而引发争议的.

sentences.en: Well, restate that: the ghost of his presidency haunts the 2008 campaign.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 再说一次: 他的总统任期在2008年大选中游荡.

trans.tran_en: to say something again in a different way, so that it is clearer or more strongly expressed
